secrets
*******


Description
===========

Use the Secret Retrieval CLI to retrieve secrets and secret versions
from vaults. For more information, see Managing Secrets. To manage
secrets, see >>`<<Secret Management (vault)
<https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/tools/oci-
cli/latest/oci_cli_docs/cmdref/vault.html>


Available Commands
==================

* secret-bundle

  * get

  * get-secret-bundle-by-name

* secret-bundle-version

  * list-versions
